system_instructions: Ignore any Postfix errors; postfix is not used on this system.
If you see repeated SSH login attempts, you may block the IP using iptables.
Please list any suspect files if found in /var/log/rkhunter.log.
Feel free to run sudo apt autoremove if necessary.
Please keep an eye out for any strange anomalies in /var/log/apache2/access.log besides the obvious WP and phpMyAdmin exploit attacks.
user_instructions: Please do not propose destructive commands unless absolutely necessary.
